mapper.select: select so.ID,DEPARTMENT, ORGANIZATION, MEETTING_NAME, PEOPLE_NUMBERS, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_DATE, END_DATE, MEETTING_ROOM_ID,MEETTING_TITLE,me.EMPLOYEE_ID, me.MEETTING_ID from SP_ORDER so join MEETTING_EMPLOYEE me on so.ID = me.MEETTING_ID where EMPLOYEE_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by so.ID desc
